# After Action Report Template

Copy this template to the release issue after completing the release.

---

## After Action Report: vX.Y

**Release Date:** YYYY-MM-DD
**Duration:** X hours

### Delivered

| Repo | Issue | Type | Description |
|------|-------|------|-------------|
| repo-name | #N | Bug Fix | Description |
| repo-name | #N | Enhancement | Description |
| repo-name | #N | Feature | Description |

### Deviations from Plan

| Item | What Changed | Why |
|------|--------------|-----|
| Issue #N | Description of deviation | Rationale |

### Issues Encountered

| Issue | Resolution | Follow-up |
|-------|------------|-----------|
| Description | How it was resolved | Issue #N if created |

### Effort Summary

| Metric | Value |
|--------|-------|
| Planned items | X |
| Completed | Y |
| Carried over | Z (reason) |
